p: For example, with the exception of YFV outbreaks in the past, which are currently under control because of active vaccination [ 6], there have been no arboviral outbreaks in Ghana, despite a PAR estimate that identified Ghana as one of the high-risk zones in West Africa [ 6]. That being said, a large number of patients with undiagnosed febrile conditions are reported in Ghana each year [ 6, 14], raising concerns that in some cases, these illnesses may be due to arboviral infections.
